PackageOracle.name: PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| PROGRAM NAME : PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
|| CREATED BY : COGNIZANT
|| CREATED DATE : JUN-2015
|| SUBJECT AREA : CUSTOMER
|| DESCRIPTION : LOADS CUSTOMER MEMO DATA FROM CUC_COMMENT VANTAGE TABLE INTO CHTR TABLE
||
|| CHANGE LOG:
|| CHANGED BY CHANGED ON CHANGE DESCRIPTION
|| -------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------
||
****************************************************************************************************************/
PROCEDURE process (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2);

PROCEDURE initial_load (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2);

PROCEDURE create_delta (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2);
END pkg_vnt_recon_cuc_comment;

body.name: PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| PROGRAM NAME : PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT
|| CREATED BY : COGNIZANT
|| CREATED DATE : JUN-2015
|| SUBJECT AREA : HOUSE
|| DESCRIPTION : LOADS CUSTOMER MEMO DATA FROM CUC_COMMENTS VANTAGE TABLE INTO CHTR TABLE
||
|| CHANGE LOG:
|| CHANGED BY CHANGED ON CHANGE DESCRIPTION
|| -------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------
||
****************************************************************************************************************/
SUBTYPE t_unit_name IS VARCHAR2 (30);

SUBTYPE t_userid IS VARCHAR2 (100 BYTE);

c_pkg_name CONSTANT t_unit_name := 'PKG_VNT_RECON_CUC_COMMENT';
l_delete_flag NUMBER := 0;
l_del_rec_count NUMBER := 0;
g_process_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
g_error_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
g_batchsize NUMBER := 10000;

PROCEDURE load_cuc_comment (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE update_stg_cuc_comment (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_rowid IN VARCHAR2,
p_record_load_cd IN stg.vnt_ecs_cus_data.record_load_cd%TYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE create_delta_chtr (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE create_delta (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2)
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SUBPROGRAM NAME : PROCEDURE CREATE_DELTA
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPTION : CREATE THE CUC COMMENT DELTA.
****************************************************************************************************************/
IS
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_DELTA';
l_process_rec chtr.pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_curr_cnt NUMBER;
l_prev_cnt NUMBER;
BEGIN
l_process_rec.process_name := c_pkg_name || '.' || l_proc_name;
chtr.pkg_logging.begin_process (l_process_rec,
'P_AUDIT_USER_I=' || p_audit_user_i
);

DELETE FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_stg;

COMMIT;

INSERT INTO stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_stg
(sys_cuc, prin_cuc, cust_acct_no_cuc, comment_no_cuc,
comments_cuc)
((SELECT sys_cuc, prin_cuc, cust_acct_no_cuc, comment_no_cuc,
comments_cuc
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment
MINUS
SELECT sys_cuc, prin_cuc, cust_acct_no_cuc, comment_no_cuc,
comments_cuc
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_prev)
UNION ALL
(SELECT sys_cuc, prin_cuc, cust_acct_no_cuc, comment_no_cuc,
comments_cuc
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_prev
MINUS
SELECT sys_cuc, prin_cuc, cust_acct_no_cuc, comment_no_cuc,
comments_cuc
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment));

COMMIT;

DELETE FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_delta;

COMMIT;

INSERT INTO stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_delta
SELECT *
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment cuc
WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_stg rec
WHERE cuc.cust_acct_no_cuc = rec.cust_acct_no_cuc);

COMMIT;
chtr.pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, 'SUCCESS');
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', EXCEPTION='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
chtr.pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, 'FAILURE');
RAISE;
END create_delta;

PROCEDURE process (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2)
AS
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'PROCESS';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_audit_user t_userid;
BEGIN
l_audit_user := NVL (p_audit_user_i, c_pkg_name);
l_process_rec.process_name := c_pkg_name || '.' || l_process_name;
pkg_logging.begin_process (p_process_rec_io => l_process_rec,
p_parm_in_i => ', P_AUDIT_USER_I = '
|| l_audit_user
);
create_delta_chtr (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i => l_audit_user
);
load_cuc_comment (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i => l_audit_user
);
pkg_logging.end_process (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_parm_out_i => pkg_utility.c_process_success
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_exception_i => l_proc_name
|| ', EXCEPTION='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
pkg_logging.end_process (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_parm_out_i => pkg_utility.c_process_error
);
RAISE;
END process;

PROCEDURE load_cuc_comment (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
AS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SUBPROGRAM NAME : LOAD_OFFERING
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPTION : THIS PROCEDURE IS TO LOAD SOLODB CORE REFERENCE TABLE T_OFFERING FROM THE
|| STAGING TABLE EPC_OFFER. THIS IS A INSERT/UPDATE PROCESS
|| WISH SOFT DELETE.
****************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'LOAD_CUC_COMMENT';
l_systimestamp TIMESTAMP;
l_insert_count NUMBER := 0;
l_update_count NUMBER := 0;
l_delete_count NUMBER := 0;
l_exception_count NUMBER := 0;
l_memo_id NUMBER;

CURSOR cur_stg_hsm_memo
IS
SELECT memo.comment_no_cuc AS comment_no_cuc,
memo.comments_cuc AS comments_cuc,
memo.cust_acct_no_cuc AS cust_acct_no_cuc,
memo.ROWID AS src_rwoid, memo_tar.memo_seq_no AS tar_memo_no,
party_xref.party_id AS party_id, memo_tar.memo_id AS memo_id,
memo_tar.memo_txt AS memo_txt,
memo_tar.record_stat_tar AS record_stat
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_delta memo INNER JOIN chtr.t_party_vantage_xref party_xref
ON memo.cust_acct_no_cuc = party_xref.cust_acct_num
FULL OUTER JOIN stg.stg_party_memo_delta memo_tar
ON memo.cust_acct_no_cuc = memo_tar.cust_acct_num
AND party_xref.party_id = memo_tar.party_id
;
BEGIN
l_systimestamp := SYSTIMESTAMP;
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);
g_process_record_cnt := 0;
g_error_record_cnt := 0;

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

FOR cur_rec IN cur_stg_hsm_memo
LOOP
BEGIN
l_delete_flag := 0;

IF (cur_rec.memo_id IS NULL and cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc is not null)
THEN
-- INSERT NEW RECORDS
BEGIN
l_memo_id :=
da_memo.ADD (process_rec => p_process_rec_i,
memo_type_cd => 'PRTY',
memo_persist => 'Y',
memo_seq_no => cur_rec.comment_no_cuc,
memo_txt => cur_rec.comments_cuc,
entered_by => NULL,
entered_dttm => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
da_party_memo.ADD (process_rec => p_process_rec_i,
memo_id => l_memo_id,
party_id => cur_rec.party_id,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_insert_count := l_insert_count + 1;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
l_exception_count := l_exception_count + 1;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_exception_i => l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC = '
|| cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', L_MEMO_ID = '
|| NVL (cur_rec.party_id,
l_memo_id
)
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
update_stg_cuc_comment (p_process_rec_i,
cur_rec.src_rwoid,
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_error,
p_audit_user_i
);
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_debug_i => l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC = '
|| cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', L_MEMO_ID = '
|| NVL
(cur_rec.party_id,
l_memo_id
)
|| ', STATUS = NEW RECORD INSERTED'
);
ELSIF ( cur_rec.memo_id IS NOT NULL and Cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc is not null
AND cur_rec.comment_no_cuc = cur_rec.tar_memo_no
)
THEN
IF (cur_rec.comments_cuc <> cur_rec.memo_txt)
THEN
UPDATE chtr.t_memo
SET memo_txt = cur_rec.comments_cuc,
record_stat = 'A',
modified_by = p_audit_user_i,
modified_dttm = l_systimestamp
WHERE memo_id = cur_rec.memo_id
AND memo_seq_no = cur_rec.comment_no_cuc;

l_update_count := l_update_count + 1;
pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_debug_i => l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC = '
|| cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', L_MEMO_ID = '
|| NVL
(cur_rec.party_id,
l_memo_id
)
|| ', STATUS = NEW RECORD INSERTED'
);
END IF;
ELSIF ( cur_rec.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
AND cur_rec.memo_id IS NOT NULL
AND cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc IS NULL
)
THEN
UPDATE chtr.t_memo
SET record_stat = 'D',
modified_by = p_audit_user_i,
modified_dttm = l_systimestamp
WHERE memo_id = cur_rec.memo_id
AND memo_seq_no = cur_rec.tar_memo_no;

l_delete_count := l_delete_count + 1;
COMMIT;
END IF;

IF l_delete_flag = 0
THEN
update_stg_cuc_comment (p_process_rec_i,
cur_rec.src_rwoid,
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_processed,
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
l_exception_count := l_exception_count + 1;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_exception_i => l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC = '
|| cur_rec.cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', L_MEMO_ID = '
|| NVL (cur_rec.party_id,
l_memo_id
)
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);

IF l_delete_flag = 0
THEN
update_stg_cuc_comment (p_process_rec_i,
cur_rec.src_rwoid,
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_error,
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END;

EXIT WHEN pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name);
END LOOP;

pkg_logging.process_log_detail_category
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_process_id_i => p_process_rec_i.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i,
p_audit_bucket_i => l_proc_name,
p_insert_count_i => l_insert_count,
p_update_count_i => l_update_count,
p_delete_count_i => l_delete_count,
p_exception_count_i => l_exception_count
);
--MAKING ENTRY TO THE PROCESS CHILD TABLE AGAINST TOTAL PROCESSED RECORD COUNT
pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_prcssed_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => g_process_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => p_process_rec_i.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
--MAKING ENTRY TO THE PROCESS CHILD TABLE AGAINST TOTAL ERROR RECORD COUNT
pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_error_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => g_error_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => p_process_rec_i.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_debug_i => l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
COMMIT;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_exception_i => l_proc_name
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
END load_cuc_comment;

PROCEDURE create_delta_chtr (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
AS
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_DELTA_CHTR';
l_systimestamp TIMESTAMP;
BEGIN
l_systimestamp := SYSDATE;
stg.pkg_stg_pre_process.swap_cur_prev_tbl
(p_cur_tbl => 'STG_PARTY_MEMO_DELTA',
p_prev_tbl => NULL,
p_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);

INSERT INTO stg.stg_party_memo_delta
SELECT DISTINCT party_xref.party_id AS party_id,
party_xref.cust_acct_num AS cust_acct_num,
memo_tar.memo_id AS memo_id,
memo_tar.memo_seq_no AS memo_seq_no,
memo_tar.memo_txt AS memo_txt,
memo_tar.record_stat AS record_stat_tar,
' ' AS record_load,
l_systimestamp AS record_load_dttm
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_stg memo_delta INNER JOIN chtr.t_party_vantage_xref party_xref
ON memo_delta.cust_acct_no_cuc =
party_xref.cust_acct_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN chtr.t_party_memo par_memo
ON par_memo.party_id = party_xref.party_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN chtr.t_memo memo_tar
ON memo_tar.memo_id = par_memo.memo_id
;

COMMIT;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_exception_i => l_proc_name
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
RAISE;
END create_delta_chtr;

PROCEDURE update_stg_cuc_comment (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_rowid IN VARCHAR2,
p_record_load_cd IN stg.vnt_ecs_cus_data.record_load_cd%TYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/*******************************************************************************************************************
|| SUBPROGRAM NAME : PROCEDURE UPDATE_STG_CTD_DISPLAY
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPTION : THIS PROCEDURE WILL UPDATE STAGING TABLE STG.EPC_OFFER.
*******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STG_CUC_COMMENT';
l_systimestamp TIMESTAMP;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);
l_systimestamp := SYSTIMESTAMP;

UPDATE stg.vnt_cuc_comment_rec_delta s
SET s.record_load_cd =
NVL (p_record_load_cd, pkg_utility.c_stg_processed),
s.record_dttm = l_systimestamp
WHERE s.ROWID = p_rowid;

IF (NVL (p_record_load_cd, pkg_utility.c_stg_processed)) =
pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
THEN
g_process_record_cnt := g_process_record_cnt + 1;
ELSIF (p_record_load_cd = pkg_utility.c_stg_error)
THEN
g_error_record_cnt := g_error_record_cnt + 1;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
END update_stg_cuc_comment;

PROCEDURE initial_load (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2)
IS
CURSOR cur_stg_cuc_comment
IS
SELECT s_memo_id.NEXTVAL AS memo_id, cust_acct_no_cuc,
comment_no_cuc, comments_cuc, party_id,
memo.ROWID AS src_rwoid, record_load_cd
FROM stg.vnt_cuc_comment memo INNER JOIN chtr.t_party_vantage_xref party_xref
ON memo.cust_acct_no_cuc = party_xref.cust_acct_num
WHERE memo.record_load_cd IS NULL;

TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl IS TABLE OF cur_stg_cuc_comment%ROWTYPE
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
l_action VARCHAR2 (1) := 'I';
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'INITIAL_LOAD';
l_process_name chtr.t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec chtr.pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_systimestamp TIMESTAMP;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl;
BEGIN
l_systimestamp := SYSTIMESTAMP;
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);
g_process_record_cnt := 0;
g_error_record_cnt := 0;

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

IF (cur_stg_cuc_comment%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_cuc_comment;
END IF;

OPEN cur_stg_cuc_comment;

LOOP
FETCH cur_stg_cuc_comment
BULK COLLECT INTO l_cursor_data LIMIT g_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0)
THEN
BEGIN
FORALL i IN 1 .. l_cursor_data.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO chtr.t_memo
(memo_id, memo_type_cd, memo_persist,
memo_seq_no,
memo_txt, record_stat,
created_dttm, created_by
)
VALUES (l_cursor_data (i).memo_id, 'PRTY', 'Y',
l_cursor_data (i).comment_no_cuc,
l_cursor_data (i).comments_cuc, 'A',
l_systimestamp, p_audit_user_i
);
COMMIT;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| chtr.pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX;
l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd :=
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC='
|| l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', COMMENT_NO_CUC='
|| l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).comment_no_cuc
|| ', EXCEPTION='
|| SQLERRM
(-SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE)
);
END LOOP;
END;

BEGIN
FORALL i IN 1 .. l_cursor_data.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO chtr.t_party_memo
(memo_id,
party_id, record_stat,
created_dttm, created_by
)
VALUES (l_cursor_data (i).memo_id,
l_cursor_data (i).party_id, 'A',
l_systimestamp, p_audit_user_i
);
COMMIT;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| chtr.pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX;
l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd :=
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', CUST_ACCT_NO_CUC='
|| l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).cust_acct_no_cuc
|| ', COMMENT_NO_CUC='
|| l_cursor_data (l_coll_idx).comment_no_cuc
|| ', EXCEPTION='
|| SQLERRM
(-SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE)
);
END LOOP;
END;

BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| chtr.pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);
FORALL i IN 1 .. l_cursor_data.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
UPDATE stg.vnt_cuc_comment s
SET s.record_load_cd =
NVL (l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd,
chtr.pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
)
WHERE ROWID = l_cursor_data (i).src_rwoid;
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| chtr.pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
END;
END IF;

EXIT WHEN l_cursor_data.COUNT () < g_batchsize
OR pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name);
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_cuc_comment;

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| chtr.pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;

IF (cur_stg_cuc_comment%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_cuc_comment;
END IF;

pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, 'ERROR WHILE PROCESSING');
pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec,
DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END initial_load;
END pkg_vnt_recon_cuc_comment;
